channel.title: Pickpocket option [DELTA/ALLSTAR] Already fixed
channel.description: So i simply added my thieving system to my server after i added my method i realised that i dont know how can i make when i click at a npc and the npc have an option "pickpocket" ill make my method go on i mean if you didnt understand me i want to click an option "pickpocket" and if i clicked that option something will happen. Thanks for help.
